text: Anama hutege'za afu aganahe'zane asarehe'zane korapa rone'amo'zanena e'za noma'afina ne'zana eme ne'naze. Ana nehu'za Ra Anumzamo'ma knazama atregeno agrite'ma e'nea zankura, Jopuna eme zamasunku hunente'za, azeri hankaveti nanekea hu'naze. Ana nehu'za mago mago vahe'mo'a muse zana, zagone golireti'ma tro'ma hu'naza rini eritere hu'za eme ami'naze.
